General.Name: ONETECH SOLUTIONS HOLDINGS BERHAD
General.Description: Onetech Solutions Holdings Berhad, an investment holding company, provides enterprise software solutions and related support services to the plantation industry in Malaysia. Its support services include IT consulting, training, system integration, software customization and upgrade, implementation, and maintenance support. The company also offers business development, customization and enhancement, and project and consulting services. Onetech Solutions Holdings Berhad was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Petaling Jaya, Malaysia.
